snippet.title: Ruby: A RWBY Fangame 1.7.8 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Here we are, finally the massive update to the game, you been waiting for!

New in this version:
* Playable Weiss,Blake, & Yang, each designed to play in unique ways! Press Spacebar (default) to swap control with Ruby's 'partner'.
* Chapter 3 of Story Mode
* New custom soundtrack inspired by the show! - Made by: @dalirakhimkulov4957 
* Free Missions now include fun little dialogue exchanges
* New Enemies and Bosses
New Graphical Guides & Tutorials
* Bug Fixes / Balance Changes
* Optimizations 

Join the discussion, and early test builds on Discord:
https://discord.gg/M4479aaGbm

Follow Ruby development:
https://twitter.com/DelphaDesign
https://ishmaru.itch.io/rwby
https://gamejolt.com/games/rwby/660552
https://www.indiedb.com/games/ruby-rwby-fangame

#rwby #rwbyfangame
